data.name: World of Warships — Yūbari Pack
data.detailed_description:
Yūbari stands out among cruisers for her destroyer-like concealment, speed, and torpedoes; she stands out among low-tier ships for her excellent AA armament.

Key features:

  • Access to the Aiming Systems Modification 0 upgrade
  • High AA defense efficiency
  • High maneuverability
  • Low damage per minute.

This package includes:

  • Yūbari, Japanese Tier IV cruiser
  • Steam commemorative flag
  • Steam container
  • Port slot

The drop chances for the Steam container can be found here.

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 1125 Doubloons as compensation.

You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.1
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
